<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15346</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Dai quattro angoli d'Europa</string>
            <string language="en">From All Four Corners of Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Von allen vier Ecken von Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">De chacun des quatre coins de l'Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">De todos os quatro cantos de Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Και από τις τέσσερις γωνίες της Ευρώπης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">De las cuatro esquinas de Europa</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questa è una webquest interdisciplinare per alunni tra i 12 e i 18 anni con abilità di base dell'uso del computer e una buona padronanza della lingua inglese (intermediate-advanced).</string>
            <string language="en">This is a cross-curricular web quest for pupils aged 12-18 with basic computer skills and a good command of English (intermediate-advanced).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">webquest</string>
            <string language="en">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">cittadinanza Europea</string>
            <string language="en">European citizenship</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Kreuzlehrplanweb-Suche nach 
gealterten Pupillen den 12-18 mit grundlegenden Computerfähigkeiten 
und einem guten Befehl von Englisch (Zwischen-vorgerückt).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une recherche croix-curriculaire de Web pour 
des pupilles âgées 12-18 avec des qualifications de base 
d'ordinateur et une bonne commande de l'anglais 
(intermédiaire-avancé).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um quest cruz-cross-curricular do Web para
as pupilas envelhecidas 12-18 com habilidades básicas do computador e
um comando bom do inglês (intermediário-avançado).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια διαγώνιος-διδακτική αναζήτηση Ιστού 
για τους μαθητές ηλικίας 12-18 με τις βασικές δεξιότητες 
υπολογιστών και μια καλή εντολή των αγγλικών 
(ενδιάμεσος-προηγμένων).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una búsqueda cruz-del plan de estudios 
del Web para las pupilas envejecidas 12-18 con habilidades básicas 
del ordenador y un buen comando del inglés (intermedio-avanzado).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Europäische Staatsbürgerschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Citoyenneté européenne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mais webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Citizenship europeu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">o πιό ωεψquεστ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευρωπαϊκή υπηκοότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el ma's webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciudadanía europea</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>

          </intendedEndUserRole>

          </context>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">12-18</string>
            <string language="en">12-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Fornisce agli alunni opportunità  di sviluppare le abilità chiave nella comunicazione, attraverso la ricerca, la discussione e la condivisione delle informazioni e delle idee su posti affascinanti dai quattro angoli dell'Europa. In altre parole, si focalizza sull'apprendimento cooperativo o collaborativo. Materie scolastiche: inglese, geografia, cittadinanza europea, TIC</string>
            <string language="en">It provides opportunities for pupils to develop the key skills of communication, through researching, discussing and sharing information and ideas about fascinating places from all four corners of Europe. In other words, it focuses on cooperative or collaborative learning.
School subjects: English, Geography, European Citizenship, ICT</string>
          </description>
        </educational>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc"><rdf:RDF xmlns="http://web.resource.org/cc/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"><Work rdf:about=""><license rdf:resource="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.5/" /></Work><License rdf:about="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.5/"><requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Attribution" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Reproduction" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Distribution" /><permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/DerivativeWorks" /><requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Notice" /></License></rdf:RDF></string>
